name: Car world
des: Authentication system implemented with Firebase.Designed dashboard and implemented user, admin management page.Users can order products and can see their orders list from dashboard. Admin can add, delete,update a product and also create a new admin.

name: Travelo
des: User Authentication using firebase.Users can book a service and remove their services.Admin only adds new services and manage all orders of all users.

name: Evercare Hospital
des: Service website with Google & Email, Password login system.Users can see service details by clicking on the read more button.Fully Responsive for mobile and desktop version.

name: Edumig
des: User can see some english learning service in home page and more service will see by clicking on the courses button.Then in about page,course related details information is describe & in contact page,available options like email,phone-number,address for connect.
